short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced Management for Your Job Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Job Application Tracker: Stay Organized, Land Jobs"

Description:
Introducing a significant upgrade to your trusted Job Application Tracker Chrome Extension! With this latest update, we've transcended beyond simply tracking your job applications. Now, embark on a more dynamic job search journey with access to new job opportunities directly through the extension.

What's New:

⦿ Discover New Job Opportunities: Our extension now actively suggests new job listings, allowing you to explore and apply to fresh opportunities that you haven't encountered yet.
⦿ User Consent for Data Sharing: We prioritize your privacy. The extension requests your consent to use your job application data. This data is used responsibly to present new job opportunities, creating a valuable experience for all users.
⦿ Enhanced Job Tracking Features: Continue to effortlessly track and manage your job applications on various websites with improved efficiency.
⦿ Modernized Interface: Experience a sleeker, more intuitive user interface with enhanced navigation and visual elements.

Your Journey with the Updated Extension:

• Consent-Based Data Utilization: Opt-in to allow the extension to use your application data for presenting new job opportunities.
• Track and Manage Applications: Keep tabs on your job applications with our automated tracking system.
• Explore New Opportunities: Discover and apply to new job listings suggested by the extension.
• Download and Analyze: Export your job application history for deeper insights into your job search.

Supported Platforms:
Our extension seamlessly integrates with even more job application portals.

Community-Driven Development:
Your feedback fuels our growth! Encounter an issue or have suggestions? Contribute to our development through GitHub.

License:
The extension is open-source and available under the MIT License.

Disclaimer:
The Job Application Tracker is provided 'as-is' without warranty. Use it to navigate your job search with more insights and opportunities.

Upgrade your job search experience with the enhanced Job Application Tracker – now not just tracking, but also unlocking new doors in your career path.
